title: The Cloudspotter's Guide - passage best described

content.question: The passage is best described as

choices.label: a reevaluation of the work of particular writers
a description of an influential movement in the arts
a plea for financial support for avant-garde artists
a comparison between classical and contemporary artistic ideals

content.answer: a description of an influential movement in the arts

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
